nodes.text: The capitol building was a structure located in Harazod, the capital city of Gerrard V. In 0 BBY, local rebels commanded by General Camon Udeon retreated to the capitol building after their attempt to capture and hold Harazod was countered by Imperial forces under Admiral Jion Trynn. Udeon was offered terms of surrender; the rebel refused, and Trynn bombarded the urban center of Harazod.
